div.p: Reduction of PM 2.5 concentration (μg m −3) and ozone mixing ratio (ppb) due to climate change mitigation policies under the Stringent Legislation case of air quality. NDC scenario compared with the Reference in 2030 (REF—NDC) for a PM 2.5 and b ozone. 2 °C scenario compared with the Reference in 2050 (REF—2 °C) for c PM 2.5 and d ozone. Positive values indicate improved air quality
